title: [Whistler's Pass, Grassy Field]
description: The trail swings wide to avoid a large boulder covered with moss, glistening in the moonlight.  Moonlight breaks through the thin veil of mist hovering near the treetops.  Songbirds whistle a merry tune somewhere in the trees above.

The trail swings wide to avoid a large boulder covered with moss.  Sunlight breaks through the thin veil of mist hovering near the treetops.  Songbirds whistle a merry tune somewhere in the trees above.
